tooltip: Select Kad-A-Kana, Deku Princess, as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Princess Kad-A-Kana focuses on creating overwhelming numbers of cheap Deku Scrub units.
Allows you to summon Princess Kad-A-Kana, a ranged hero that attacks with bursting bubbles.
Flying Scrub unit that drops explosive Deku Nuts on its targets.
All buildings spawn a Battalion of Scrublings when destroyed.
Scrublings, Guardlings, Nutlings, and Megascrub Battalion size is increased.
